name: The Labyrinth Run
description:
After waking up in a cell, you must find your way out in an ever shifting series of rooms.  A mysterious voice guides you, supplying you powerups, weapons, and breaks down the doors as you make your desperate escape from this prison.

Speedrun your way through for the best possible time with the new speedrun feature.

This game was made in collaboration with the Cal Poly Pomona Game Development Club.

Credits of the Game go to

Brad Bolluyt, Laurence Garcia, Jonah Mokhtarzadeh, Corey Nambu, Raymond Wong, Taehyuan Yoon
